Package cxro.common.io.modbus.client

Provides interfaces and classes that encapsulate Modbus messages in an object oriented manner.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ModbusChannel  
    ModbusMessage
    Manage the Modbus Protocol Data Unit (PDU).
    ModbusTcpChannel
    Class that implements a Modbus/TCP protocol channel.
    ModbusTransaction
    Abstract base class implementing a ModbusTransaction.
    ModbusUdpChannel
    Class that implements a Modbus/UDP protocol channel.
    ReadRODiscretesTransaction
    Class implementing a ReadRODiscretes transaction.
    ReadRORegistersTransaction
    Class implementing a ReadRORegisters transaction.
    ReadRWDiscretesTransaction
    Class implementing a ReadRWDiscretes transaction.
    ReadRWRegistersTransaction
    Class implementing a ReadRegistersRW transaction.
    WriteRWDiscretesTransaction
    Class implementing a WriteRWdiscretes transaction.
    WriteRWDiscreteTransaction
    Class implementing a WriteSingleDiscreteRW transaction.
    WriteRWRegistersTransaction
    Class implementing a WriteRWRegisters transaction.
    WriteRWRegisterTransaction
    Class implementing a WriteRWRegister transaction.

Package cxro.common.io.modbus.client Description

Provides interfaces and classes that encapsulate Modbus messages in an object oriented manner.

Package Specification
